Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.grid.AbstractGrid<Actor>
      • Grid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    info.gridworld.grid.Grid<Actor>

    public class Grid
extends info.gridworld.grid.AbstractGrid<Actor>
    The grid class creates a grid of Actors.
    Version:
    5/15/17
    Author:
    Sarah Lu, Ally Wang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Grid(int rows, int cols)
      The constructor creates a 2D array for the grid and adds Actors to it.
